scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && tsc-alias
scripts.db:migrate:down: ts-node node_modules/.bin/knex migrate:down --migrations-directory ./migrations --client pg --migrations-table-name knex_migrations --connection $(ts-node scripts/db-connection)
scripts.db:migrate:latest: ts-node node_modules/.bin/knex migrate:latest --migrations-directory ./migrations --client pg --migrations-table-name knex_migrations --connection $(ts-node scripts/db-connection)
scripts.db:migrate:reset: npm run db:migrate:rollback --all && npm run db:migrate:latest
scripts.db:migrate:rollback: ts-node node_modules/.bin/knex migrate:rollback --migrations-directory ./migrations --client pg --migrations-table-name knex_migrations --connection $(ts-node scripts/db-connection)
scripts.db:migrate:status: ts-node node_modules/.bin/knex migrate:status --migrations-directory ./migrations --client pg --migrations-table-name knex_migrations --connection $(ts-node scripts/db-connection)
scripts.db:migrate:up: ts-node node_modules/.bin/knex migrate:up --migrations-directory ./migrations --client pg --migrations-table-name knex_migrations --connection $(ts-node scripts/db-connection)
scripts.db:migrate:version: ts-node node_modules/.bin/knex migrate:currentVersion --migrations-directory ./migrations --client pg --migrations-table-name knex_migrations --connection $(ts-node scripts/db-connection)
scripts.start:debug: tsc --sourceMap -p tsconfig.build.json && tsc-alias && node --inspect -r dotenv/config dist/index
